languages.text: Вокс издает одну и ту же повторяющуюся запись — отчаянные призывы о помощи, истошные крики и надрывный вой умирающего человека.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Из рации доносятся зацикленная запись с криками умирающих солдат

languages.text: The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.
languages.original_text: Вокс издает одну и ту же повторяющуюся запись — отчаянные призывы о помощи, истошные крики и надрывный вой умирающего человека.

traits.locale_text: The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.
The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.

The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.
The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.

languages.text: 音阵系统重复着同样的录音，包括绝望的求救声、撕心裂肺的哭喊声，以及某个垂死之人歇斯底里的嚎叫声。
languages.original_text: The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.

traits.locale_text: 音阵系统重复着同样的录音，包括绝望的求救声、撕心裂肺的哭喊声，以及某个垂死之人歇斯底里的嚎叫声。

languages.text: El voco transmite la misma grabación repetidamente: llamadas de socorro desesperadas, gritos desaforados y los aullidos histéricos de un moribundo.
languages.original_text: The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.

traits.locale_text: El voco transmite la misma grabación repetidamente: llamadas de socorro desesperadas, gritos desaforados y los aullidos histéricos de un moribundo.

languages.text: ヴォクスは、何度も同じ録音内容を送信する―必死に助けを求める声、やるせない叫び声、そして死にゆく男の狂ったような雄叫び。
languages.original_text: The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.

traits.locale_text: ヴォクスは、何度も同じ録音内容を送信する―必死に助けを求める声、やるせない叫び声、そして死にゆく男の狂ったような雄叫び。

languages.text: Das Vox wiederholt immer dieselbe Aufzeichnung – verzweifelte Hilferufe, herzzerreißende Schreie und das hysterische Heulen eines Sterbenden.
languages.original_text: The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.

traits.locale_text: Das Vox wiederholt immer dieselbe Aufzeichnung – verzweifelte Hilferufe, herzzerreißende Schreie und das hysterische Heulen eines Sterbenden.

languages.text: Le vox transmet le même enregistrement en boucle : des appels à l'aide désespérés, des cris bouleversants et le hurlement hystérique d'un homme agonisant.
languages.original_text: The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.

traits.locale_text: Le vox transmet le même enregistrement en boucle : des appels à l'aide désespérés, des cris bouleversants et le hurlement hystérique d'un homme agonisant.

languages.text: Voks; umutsuz yardım çağrıları, yürek burkan ağlamalar ve ölmekte olan bir adamın histerik feryatlarından oluşan kaydı tekrar tekrar yayınlıyor.
languages.original_text: The vox transmits the same repeating recording — desperate calls for help, heart-rending cries and the hysterical howl of a dying man.

traits.locale_text: Voks; umutsuz yardım çağrıları, yürek burkan ağlamalar ve ölmekte olan bir adamın histerik feryatlarından oluşan kaydı tekrar tekrar yayınlıyor.
